quotes.message: Meditation is the soul's perspective glass.
quotes.name: Owen Feltham

quotes.message: Meditation is a way for nourishing and blossoming the divinity within you.
quotes.name: Amit Ray

quotes.message: You should sit in meditation for twenty minutes a day, unless you are too busy. Then you should sit for an hour.
quotes.name: Zen Proverb

quotes.message: Meditation is not a means to an end. It is both the means and the end.
quotes.name: Jiddhu Krishnamurti

quotes.message: Meditation allows us to directly participate in our lives instead of living life as an afterthought.
quotes.name: Stephen Levine

quotes.message: Generally we waste our lives, distracted from our true selves, in endless activity. Meditation is the way to bring us back to ourselves, where we can really experience and taste our full being.
quotes.name: Sogyal Rinpoche

quotes.message: The whole of meditation practice can be essentialized into these 3 crucial points: Bring your mind home. Release.
quotes.name: Sogyal Rinpoche

quotes.message: Meditation is the discovery that the point of life is always arrived at in the immediate moment.
quotes.name: Alan Watts

quotes.message: Meditation is the dissolution of thoughts in Eternal awareness or Pure consciousness without objectification, knowing without thinking, merging finitude in infinity.
quotes.name: Swami Sivananda

quotes.message: Meditation brings wisdom; lack of mediation leaves ignorance. Know well what leads you forward and what hold you back, and choose the path that leads to wisdom.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Meditation here may think down hours to moments. Here the heart may give a useful lesson to the head and learning wiser grow without his books.
quotes.name: William Cowper

quotes.message: A good meditation, even when it is interrupted by occasional nodding, is much more beneficial than many outward religious exercises.
quotes.name: Johannes Tauler

quotes.message: One hour's meditation on the work of the Creator is better than seventy years of prayer.
quotes.name: Muhammad

quotes.message: Meditation is the tongue of the soul and the language of our spirit.
quotes.name: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.message: When you meditate, the silence of the senses illumines the presence of God within.
quotes.name: Gurumayi Chidvilasananda

quotes.message: Meditation is the soul's perspective glass.
quotes.name: Owen Feltham

quotes.message: Through meditation and by giving full attention to one thing at a time, we can learn to direct attention where we choose.
quotes.name: Eknath Easwaran

quotes.message: When meditation is mastered, the mind is unwavering like the flame of a lamp in a windless place.
quotes.name: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.message: Meditation gives us peace of mind without a tranquilizer. And unlike a tranquilizer, the peace of mind that we get from meditation does not fade away. It lasts for good in some corner of the inmost recesses of our aspiring heart.
quotes.name: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.message: Meditation is a death - death of all that you are now. Of course there will be a resurrection, but that will be a totally new, fresh original being which you are not even aware is hidden in you.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: In meditation, once you are gone in, you are gone in. Then, even when you resurrect you are a totally different person. The old personality is nowhere to be found. You have to start your life again from abc. You have to learn everything with fresh eyes, with a totally new heart. That's why meditation creates fear.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Meditation is enough. Everything else follows on its own.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Meditation is to the mind what exercise is to the body, it warms and invigorates.
quotes.name: John Thornton

quotes.message: Meditation is the womb of our actions; action the midwife of our meditations.
quotes.name: Arthur Warwick

quotes.message: Meditation is not the menu; it's the meal.
quotes.name: Victor Davich

quotes.message: Meditation is not a way of making your mind quiet. It is a way of entering into the quiet that is already there buried under the 50,000 thoughts the average person thinks every day.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: Meditate, Visualize and Create your own reality and the universe will simply reflect back to you.
quotes.name: Amit Ray

quotes.message: Meditation practice isn't about trying to throw ourselves away and become something better, it's about befriending who we are.
quotes.name: Ani Pema Chodron
